actions.text: Amendment SA 2211 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 2211 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S15507-15508; text: CR S15507-15508) To add provisions relating to accident and safety data classification and publication from H.R. 1527 as passed by the House of Representatives, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2211 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2211 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator McCain.

purpose: To add provisions relating to accident and safety data classification and publication from H.R. 1527 as passed by the House of Representatives, and for other purposes.
